name: The Next Heatwave
description:
This was made as a prototype for the game jam: ★ JUNE/JULY JACKPOT JAM ★ WIN $$$

A horror game about surviving until the next heatwave comes. You find a house, and your mission is to try to hide from a creature. You have limited time to hide. 

THERE ARE THREE ENDINGS! Try to find 'em all!

Move with WASD, or Arrow Keys. Space to jump. Click objects to interact with them, or get information about them.
